'''Meril''' can refer to:

*'''[[meril]]''', the [[Sindarin]] word for the flower '''[[Roses#Names|rose]]'''
**the translation of [[Rose Cotton#Etymology|'''Rose''' (Gamgee)]] in the [[King's Letter]]
*'''[[Meril (mother of Gil-galad)|Meril]]''', the name of the mother of [[Gil-galad]] in one version of the [[legendarium]]
*'''[[Meril-i-Turinqi]]''', the Lady of [[Tol Eressëa]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''
